abstract: A Dutch court dismissed most of the claims brought by Nigerian farmers seeking to hold Royal Dutch Shell accountable for damage from its pipelines.
snippet: A Dutch court dismissed most of the claims brought by Nigerian farmers seeking to hold Royal Dutch Shell accountable for damage from its pipelines.
lead_paragraph: In a legal dispute that had been closely watched by multinational companies and environmental organizations, a Dutch court Wednesday dismissed most of the claims brought by Nigerian farmers seeking to hold Royal Dutch Shell accountable for damage by oil spilled from its pipelines.

headline.main: Mixed Decision for Shell in Nigeria Oil Spill Suits
headline.print_headline:
Shell Is Mostly Cleared
Of Nigerian Oil Spill Claims

byline.original: By David Jolly and Stanley Reed
